name: auto-http-status
description: A lightweight Node.js library to automatically determine the correct HTTP status code from errors and data, with an optional AI-powered layer.

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && node scripts/fix-esm-imports.js && echo {"type":"module"} > dist/esm/package.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.check: npm run build && npm run test:coverage

author: Siddh Tailor
